title: Was the letter of Tramp SAG-AFTRA signed by President Donald J. Trump?
subtitle: The use of the title "President" in the signature does not seem unusual among the former Presidents.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: On February 4, 2021, a letter of resignation from the SAG-AFTRA, a film and television performer ' s union, was signed by former United States President Donald Trump as President Donald J. Trump.
